ğŸ’¡ Custom Scoring Solution:

# Composite anomaly scoring
def calculate_security_score(user_data):
    # Normalize scores to 0-1 range
    cluster_score = normalize_cluster_distance(user_data)
    isolation_score = isolation_forest.decision_function(user_data)
    temporal_score = calculate_temporal_anomaly(user_data)
    privilege_score = assess_privilege_anomaly(user_data)
    
    # Weighted combination
    weights = {'cluster': 0.3, 'isolation': 0.4, 
               'temporal': 0.2, 'privilege': 0.1}
    
    final_score = (cluster_score * weights['cluster'] + 
                   isolation_score * weights['isolation'] +
                   temporal_score * weights['temporal'] + 
                   privilege_score * weights['privilege'])
    
    return final_score

ğŸ” Key Insights:

  • Combines multiple detection methods
  • Uses weighted scores based on security importance
  • Provides interpretable risk ranking
  • Can be tuned based on organizational needs
